Uses of Package
org.bukkit.event.server

Packages that use org.bukkit.event.server 
Package Description
com.destroystokyo.paper.event.server  
org.bukkit.event.server
Events relating to programmatic state changes on the server.
  • Classes in org.bukkit.event.server used by com.destroystokyo.paper.event.server 
    Class Description
    ServerEvent
    Miscellaneous server events
    ServerListPingEvent
    Called when a server list ping is coming in.
  • Classes in org.bukkit.event.server used by org.bukkit.event.server 
    Class Description
    PluginEvent
    Used for plugin enable and disable events
    ServerCommandEvent
    This event is called when a command is run by a non-player.
    ServerEvent
    Miscellaneous server events
    ServerLoadEvent.LoadType
    Represents the context in which the enclosing event has been completed.
    ServiceEvent
    An event relating to a registered service.
